---
description: Set the key image field for view only txos. Useful for offline transaction signing and hot + cold wallet flows. Any of the view only txos for which the supplied key-image already exists on the blockchain will be marked as spent. 
---

# Set View Only Txos Key Images

## Parameters

| Parameter | Purpose | Requirements |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `txos_with_key_images` | An array of tuples, with the first element being the hex encoded and serialized txout and the second element being the hex encoded and serialized key image. | The view only txos must exist in the DB. |

## Example

{% tabs %}
{% tab title="Request Body" %}
```text
{
  "method": "set_view_only_txos_key_images",
  "params": {
    "txos_with_key_images": "[("", "0a202eb6fc891978f34e772164abe746398e0e3bc16e9d6c48a9dc3e700b2b206437"), ("", "0a2096b7d2d3ddb633b412d2890f9d6bf17ce962bb57d5b5a0589e59e60e15e44e65"), ("", "0a2072974784407d15fa1cda0b858b220bab1a9a74c61bd859ff00058b21d51ecb6d")]",
  },
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1
}
```
{% endtab %}

{% tab title="Response" %}
```text
{
  "method": "set_view_only_txos_key_images",
  "result":{"success":true},"
  },
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1
}
```
{% endtab %}
{% endtabs %}
